artificer.hit_points_at_higher_levels: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per artificer level after 1st
artificer.tools: Thieves' tools, two other tools of your choice
artificer.skills: Choose three from Arcana, Deception, History, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Religion, and Sleight of Hand
artificer.equipment1: (a) a handaxe and a light hammer or (b) any two simple weapons
artificer.equipment3: (a) scale mail or (b) studded leather armor and in addition you get thieves' tools and a dungeoneer's pack
artificer.quickbuild: You can make a artificer quickly by following these suggestions. First put your highest ability score in Dexterity, followed by Inteligence and Constitution

barbarian.hit_points_at_higher_levels: 1d12 (or 7) + your Constitution modifier per barbarian level after 1st
barbarian.skills: Choose two from Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, and Survival
barbarian.equipment1: (a) a greataxe or (b) any martial melee weapon
barbarian.equipment2: (a) two handaxes or (b) any simple weapon
barbarian.equipment3: An explorer’s pack and four javelins
barbarian.quickbuild: You can make a barbarian quickly by following these suggestions. First, put your highest ability score in Strength, followed by Constitution. Second, choose the outlander background.

bard.hit_points_at_higher_levels: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per bard level after 1st
bard.weapons: Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
bard.tools: Three musical instruments of your choice
bard.equipment1: (a) a rapier, (b) a longsword, or (c) any simple weapon
bard.equipment2: (a) a Diplomat's Pack or (b) an Entertainer's Pack
bard.equipment3: (a) a lute or (b) any other musical instrument in addition you get Leather armor and a dagger
bard.quickbuild: You can make a bard quickly by following these suggestions. First, Charisma should be your highest ability score, followed by Dexterity. Second, choose the entertainer background. Third, choose the dancing lights and vicious mockery cantrips, along with the following 1st-level spells: charm person, detect magic, healing word, and thunderwave.

bloodhunter.hit_points_at_higher_levels: 1d10 (or 6) + your Constitution modifier per blood hunter level after 1st
bloodhunter.skills: Choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Arcana, Insight, Investigation, and Survival
bloodhunter.equipment1: (a) a martial weapon or (b) two simple weapons
bloodhunter.equipment2: (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) hand crossbow and 20 bolts
bloodhunter.equipment3: (a) studded leather armor or (b) scale mail armor  an explorer’s pack
bloodhunter.quickbuild: You can make a blood hunter quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Strength or Dexterity your highest ability score, depending on whether you want to focus on melee weapons, or ranged and finesse weapons. Make Wisdom your next highest if you plan to focus on the potency of blood curses and mystical power. Choose a higher Constitution next if you wish to use Crimson Rite on multiple weapons or want to have extra hit points to burn on amplifying blood curses. Then, select the Haunted One or Acolyte background.

cleric.hit_points_at_higher_levels: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per cleric level after 1st
cleric.skills: Choose two from History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion
cleric.equipment1: (a) a mace or (b) a warhammer (if proficient)
cleric.equipment2: (a) scale mail, (b) leather armor, or (c) chain mail (if proficient)
cleric.equipment3: (a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) any simple weapon  (a) a priest’s pack or (b) an explorer’s pack  A shield and a holy symbol
cleric.quickbuild: You can make a cleric quickly by following these suggestions. First, Wisdom should be your highest ability score, followed by Strength or Constitution. Second, choose the acolyte background.
